description: A mock fullstack social media site.  Made using the PERN (Postgres, Express, React, Node) stack

highlights.title: Frontend
features: HTTP only JWt token based Authentication.
Like and respond to other user's posts.
Like and respond to other user's posts.

highlights.title: Backend
highlights.tagline: Technologies: Node, Express, Knex, PSQL, Mullter
features: JWT Authentication refresh token sent as a HTTP Only cookie.
Passwords are encrypted before being stored.
Uses helmetJs and cors middlewares to set security headers and only allow requests from the frontend.

description: A kanban-style list making application, created using the MERN Postgres, Express, React, Node) stack
